title: This is actually amazing
body:
This was my champ select for one of my promo games, needless to say it dodged itself :D

3 years later and it still runs worse than the legacy client!

replies.body:
there is a fix btw

just open task manager and close it than the game reopens itself and you pop back in haha did it in ranked a few times

Hope this helps a few people :D
